DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study design test hypothesis lurasidone effective , tolerable , safe treatment patient bipolar I depression
DOC.brief_title: Lurasidone - A 24-week Extension Study Patients With Bipolar I Depression
DOC.criteria: Subject judge investigator suitable participation 24week clinical trial involve openlabel lurasidone treatment Subject complete 6week treatment period require assessment final study visit ( Day 42 , Visit 8 ) either Study D1050235 , NCT # 00868452 Study D1050236 , NCT # 008668699 . Imminent risk suicide , injury self others , damage property Subject evidence severe movement disorder . Subject test positive drug abuse ( Visit 8 Study D1050235 , NCT # 00868452 D1050236 , NCT # 008688699 ) .
